import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, Upload } from 'lucide-react'; const RegistrationPage = () => { const [bio, setBio] = useState(''); const [photo, setPhoto] = useState(null); const handleBioChange = (e) => { if (e.target.value.length <= 150) { setBio(e.target.value); } }; const handlePhotoChange = (e) => { if (e.target.files && e.target.files[0]) { setPhoto(URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0])); } }; return (

Create Your Profile

{photo ? ( ) : ( )}

{bio.length}/150 characters

); }; export default RegistrationPage;
